prompts.title: Social Media Content Calendar
prompts.description: Monthly content calendar for multiple platforms
prompts.pain_points: Communications Managers are responsible for 4-5 social platforms with limited support. Content creation from scratch is time-consuming. Need to plan ahead but also stay flexible for timely content. Struggle to maintain consistent posting frequency across multiple platforms. Lack time for strategic content planning.
prompts.best_practices: Follow 60-30-10 content ratio (60% educational/impact, 30% community/behind-scenes, 10% asks). Post 2-3x/week on Facebook for orgs under 10K followers. Platform-specific optimization (LinkedIn professional, Instagram visual, etc.). Plan monthly but review weekly. Include mix of planned and responsive content. Use content themes to maintain consistency. Batch-create content when possible.
prompts.why_it_matters: Consistent social media presence builds donor relationships and community engagement. 96% of nonprofits use Facebook but struggle with regular posting. Content calendars reduce last-minute scrambling and improve strategic messaging. Allows for better campaign integration and storytelling arcs.
